"Xiera": "We've got a problem! I've just picked up another abnormal teleport reading at the Shop Area! It seems that someone else has transferred in!"
"I was monitoring the teleporter when it happened, but when I tried to trace it back, the coordinates turned into imaginary numbers... This proves that they are from a different dimension."
"I'm pretty sure they're not from Earth, at least. Please go to the Shop Area and find out what they have to say for themselves!"
